definition: of or relating to Jamaica, either the island or the country, or to its inhabitants, a person from Jamaica or of Jamaican descent
details:
adjective
- of or relating to Jamaica, either the island or the country, or to its inhabitants
= example: of or relating to Jamaica, either the island or the country, or to its inhabitants
noun
- a person from Jamaica or of Jamaican descent
= example: a person from Jamaica or of Jamaican descent
